pr_title: on H2 prior to 2.0 map NUMERIC to DECIMAL (H6)

timeline.message:
on H2 prior to 2.0 map NUMERIC to DECIMAL

This is helpful the schema update tool.

This workaround was lost during my work on Dialects.

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't this be <= instead? Current version of h2 is 1.4.200.
timeline.author: famod

replies.bodyText: I don't think so, wasn't this the thing we all agreed that they changed in the .200 release?
replies.author: gavinking
